title: Playing around with Riven.
body:
I spent yesterday playing a whole heap of non-meta supports and extremely weird builds. Here's the result of my Riven game. 
To make this game even more satisfying the enemy team had a top lane Riven. Safe to say {{champion:1}} one thought my score was better! 
If you have {{champion:1}} champion and build ideas for me throw them into the comment section below! 

=)
